channel.title: DPSF
channel.description: Dynamic Particle System Framework - Create custom particle systems in XNA quickly and easily

item.title: DPSF 2.3.0 (XNA 4) Released
item.description: September 30, 2012 - DPSF version 2.3.0 has been released. Lots of improvements and bug fixes. Particle systems now support multiple emitters! Initial support for Mono for Android.

item.title: DPSF 2.2.2 (XNA 4) Released
item.description: December 10, 2011 - DPSF version 2.2.2 has been released. This release changes the EULA so that you can use DPSF as long as you mention DPSF somewhere in your app (splash screen is no longer required).

item.title: DPSF 2.2.1 (XNA 4) Released
item.description: September 1, 2011 - DPSF version 2.2.1 has been released. This release includes some minor bug fixes and fixes some features that were broken when moving to XNA 4.

item.title: DPSF 2.2.0 (XNA 4) Released
item.description: July 1, 2011 - DPSF version 2.2.0 has been released. This release includes a fairly substantial performance enhancement and now enables all of the default particle systems (not just Sprite particle systems) to run on the Reach profile for Windows Phone 7!

item.title: DPSF 2.1.0 (XNA 4) and 1.6.0 (XNA 3.1) Released
item.description: April 11, 2011 - Versions 2.1.0 and 1.6.0 of DPSF have been released. This release includes new features, bug fixes, and performance enhancements. Now allows for 3D particles on the Windows Phone 7!

item.title: DPSF 2.0.1 (XNA 4) and 1.5.5 (XNA 3.1) Released
item.description: February 14, 2011 - Versions 2.0.1 and 1.5.5 of DPSF have been released. This release includes bug fixes and performance enhancements, especially for running on the Xbox 360.

item.title: DPSF 2.0.0.0 Released (XNA 4 Compatible)
item.description: January 11, 2011 - Version 2.0.0.0 of DPSF has been released. This release includes many changes in order to make DPSF compatible with XNA 4, and allows DPSF to run on the Windows Phone.

item.title: DPSF has a new home
item.description: DDPSF has been moved and can now be found at http://www.XNAParticles.com.

item.title: DPSF (XNA 3.1) 1.5.4.0 Released
item.description: December 8, 2010 - Version 1.5.4.0 of DPSF has been released. This release fixes a minor memory leak and adds support for using a custom SpriteBatch to draw Sprite particle systems.

item.title: DPSF XNA 4 Beta 1 Released
item.description: November 14, 2010 - The beta version of the XNA 4.0 compatible DPSF is now available.

item.title: DPSF 1.5.3.0 Released
item.description: November 10, 2010 - Version 1.5.3.0 of DPSF has been released. This release fixes a bug in the textured quad particle systems where textured would be inverted.

item.title: DPSF 1.5.2.0 Released
item.description: October 1, 2010 - Version 1.5.2.0 of DPSF has been released. This release fixes a major memory leak with with the Sprite type particle systems.

item.title: DPSF 1.5.1.0 Released
item.description: August 27, 2010 - Version 1.5.1.0 of DPSF has been released. This release fixes bugs, adds minor features, and reduces the memory footprint of the Draw() function.

item.title: DPSF 1.5.0.0 Released
item.description: April 25, 2010 - Version 1.5.0.0 of DPSF has been released. This release fixes bugs, adds minor features, and includes new explosion particle systems in the DPSF Demo.

item.title: DPSF 1.4.0.0 Released
item.description: December 4, 2009 - Version 1.4.0.0 of DPSF has been released. This release adds support for animated point sprites, and new magnet classes.

item.title: DPSF 1.3.1.0 Released
item.description: June 15, 2009 - Version 1.3.1.0 of DPSF has been released. This is a minor release that includes support for XNA Game Studio 3.1.

item.title: DPSF is now 100% free to use
item.description: June 2, 2009 - DPSF is now 100% free to use in any application, whether it is free or commercial for profit. Instead of charging for a license, DPSF now simply accepts donations instead.

item.title: DPSF was granted Softpedia's 100% Spyware/Virus/Malware Free Award
item.description: May 12, 2009 - DPSF was granted Softpedia's 100% Spyware/Virus/Malware Free Award, which is now visible on the website.

item.title: DPSF 1.3.0.0 Released
item.description: May 1, 2009 - Version 1.3.0.0 of DPSF has been released. Highlights include setting particle Bursts in the Emitter, and 5 tutorials in the Help manual.

item.title: 2 New Demo Videos
item.description: April 16, 2009 - Two new videos showing the Sphere and Grid particle systems released in DPSF v1.2's DPSF Demo have been posted on YouTube.
